law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 20, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 23, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 202, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002; and ch. 273, sec. 44, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 12, sec. 11, effective June 18, 1970.
